content.detailedDescription:
Saw commercial airlines crossing above the screen, while watching smurfs 2 with my mother and my son, on screen 1 at weirs beach drive in theater. at 9:30 pm or so, all three car occupants witness large white orb crossing above the screen, going west and leaving field of vision in the east. i first spot the white orb to my right in the corner of my peripheral vision. it is slow moving, has steady brightness, and a halo effect, as i wear prescription lenses without anti-glare. the white orb is silent, showing no exhaust, and does not appear as stationary like a star. the feelings of the car after the sighting was pleasant and curious.

after awhile, during the second movie of grown ups 2 on the same screen, all three car occupants witness commercial flights crossing above screen 1 with flashing red, green, and white lights. then at around 11:14, i then see the second orb in my peripheral vision on my right. then all the occupants witness a slow moving orange orb going west to east, following similar flight path as white orb, and disappears after crossing above the screen. it is slow moving, in a steady flight path, has no exhaust trail, has a star effect instead of a halo,is very bright, not at all like a star, and its size is as large as a penny. the feelings after the sighting were ominous and tense. 

both orbs cross the screen at a high altitude and not in front of the screen in either sighting. we continue to see commercial airline flights cris-crossing above the screen till, we leave our spot next to the concession area, near the ladies restroom entrance, which we had occupied since our arrival, and did not move from.
content.summary: Watching screen 1 at weirs beach drive in theatre. firts orb was white and crossed from west to east. an hour later a yellow/orange orb same directional path was taken. both orbs were traveling slow and steady. white orb exits orange orb vanish in vision.

content.detailedDescription:
we were driving home from our cottage in the whiteshell provincial park on highway 44, heading west towards the city of winnipeg where we live. it was around 9p.M. august 3rd. and the sun was setting with a few clouds in the sky. 
 i saw a light in the corner of my eye that initially seemed to be reflections on the hydro power lines, witch can be seen in the photos. the lights then moved a bit higher and i could see they were well above the sight line of the power lines. this is when i noticed there were four lights in a row moving at the same pace as we were travelling, 105km/h (approx. 65 mph.) at one point, the 3rd object appeared below the 4th, and continued to keep this pace for a short time. i never actually saw it move or change position, it just seemed to be there. 
 my wife was taking the pictures through the side window and windshield of my truck with my cellphone, but unfortunately we didn't get a shot of the 3rd. and 4th. as they were "stacked". we never stopped as there was other traffic and the road is quite tight and winding. i had my two daughters along who are 3 and 5, and the 5 year-old saw the lights and said they looked like shooting stars. my wife also saw them and she was taking the pictures as i drove.
 the objects gave a very brilliant metallic shine that seemed to be reflected sunlight and not produced by the objects themselves. there were no lights of any kind visible. it appeared that there was what seemed to be a small contrail in front and behind the most brilliant centre section of the objects. other than when 3 appeared below 4, they seemed to keep even spacing and pace.
 the objects then lined up again and started to move toward the western horizon. they never actually seemed to be moving , it was not like watching an airplane cross the sky. they were beside us for a while and then just seemed to be getting further ahead to the west but not moving like an airplane. my wife also noted the odd, seeming lack of movement even thought they ended up going over the western horizon.
 about 40 minutes after we first noticed them we turned on to highway 15 witch goes pretty much directly east-west. we were heading west towards home and this is when they started to go over the horizon. at about this time i noticed an airplane heading in a southerly direction. it looked very different from the objects, much less brilliant and producing a long puffy contrail. it is hard to see in the photos while the objects are still quite visible.
 we were all very interested and amazed by the objects. there was never an uneasy feeling or any fear, we just watched them as long as we could and took it all in. i showed my brother, in-laws and some friends the pictures and they all thought it was pretty wild.
 the only thing that came to mind as a possibility was maybe a line of military helicopters?? military aircraft don't reflect light like that, and there were no navigation lights. also, i have lived here all my life and we do have 17 wing air force base here, but i have never seen a line of helicopters travelling together.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Driving home from cottage saw four lights in the sky moving slowly in a line and sometimes vertically stacked

content.detailedDescription: August 4, 2013 approx 9:30 pm est. my self and a friend saw two orange glowing orbs in the south east sky moving more south and upward the two orbs stayed on the same plane and moved in lateral line maintain same distance  appeared to be approx half mile distance between the two the one on the left dispersed first and approx 30 seconds later the one to the right dispersed.  about 5 min later another orange glowing orb took the same exact path moving from the south east to the  upward to the south and appearing to disperser in the same location as the other two. each event lasted approx 3 mins.
content.summary: 8/4/13 ~ 9:30 pm est 3 orange glowing orb lights in south east sky lehigh valley pa

content.detailedDescription: Kids were in the backyard looking at stars. came in told me to come look. it is very dark in our backyard at night. if you look at venus right now it is huge and in the west. this light was four times as big as venus. it seemed to be as close as an airplane in its path. the object moved in quick movements and then slowed. made small movements in different directions. it almost looked like a someone learning to drive because of the sudden changes. the object went from the south over denair to the east a  bit and then north to about hickman and then off eastward. i have seen my share of strange here in the valley of california. this may just have been something new from area 51. who knows. if it was, whatever it is, has some skills.
content.summary: Object flew from sw variably to the ne. slowing, abrupt change in movements left/right. slowed, sped up. dropped in elev.

content.detailedDescription: Observed august 2, 2013 from emmaus pa looking toward allentown in the north east sky. witnessed by myself and 3 others witnessed one orange glowing orb floating up ward and to the east then just diapered.
content.summary: 8/2/13 ~ 9:30 pm est  orange glowing orb light in north eastern sky lehigh valley pa

content.detailedDescription:
This is the second sighting my friend and i have had within two weeks in the same spot. see july 22, 2013, in the same area for the other sighting. 
     this recent sighting was at night, 10:38 pm. a bright light moving north-east across the st. mary's river from michigan to ontario. the object was much larger than a star and bright. it became larger and brighter as it approached. i am unable to say how high up it was. there was no cloud cover. the object glowed steady white and turned dull orange in the distance. there was no blinking tail light and no sound. the object glowed white on all sides, as it approached, from underneath, and from the "rear" as it retreated. there was no deviation in is course. it was much larger than a star or planet. the light it gave off resembled a planet, but brighter and moving. 
    i have checked the space station schedule and the light we saw was not the iss. the strangest part is that my friend and i saw a grey, beehive-shaped object just a few weeks ago while walking in the same area. 
     i have a photograph of the light, but it's just a solid white light in the black sky.
content.summary: A bright white light moving quickly across the night sky; no blinking light, solid white on both sides, but turned dull orange after a time.

content.detailedDescription: Standing on porch and my wife saw it. it was brighter than the stars and moving in our direction from the southwest. in about a min or so it turned east and went across the sky. must have watched it for 5 min before the sky line had covered its course,
content.summary: Came in high in sky from sw turned east and went east

content.detailedDescription:
Home and went to close windows for the night.  just looked into the night sky and saw a light in the west.  thought it was a plane at first but as i watched the light didn't seem to move.  it appeared to be an orange sphere.

i grabbed an old pair of binoculars and didn't get a great deal of detail so i grabbed a camera with 50x zoom and zoomed in on the light.  through the camera lens it was, at first, a perfect sphere but with geometric texture.  i took 22 shots but because of the zoom and not having the camera on a tripod, most shots show camera movement.  

as i took shots i just kept saying to no one, "what is this?"  while attempting to capture shots the shape changed.  i'd stop and look out the window to see if the light looked differently and then go back to the camera lens.  

i kept trying to determine if this was a plane or blimp or what.  for the first few minutes it just looked like a sphere.  then it seemed to change shape or size so i just kept taking pictures.  at one point i almost laughed at myself figuring i would hear that it was just some special display.  as it seemed to change shape it just suddenly was gone.

when i looked at the shots i got i decided that it was not a plane or blimp or any flying object that i could identify.  i went back on my patio and noted that it was a clear night with stars visible but the stars visible were much smaller and not orange in color.
content.summary: Watched and photographed object in night sky

content.detailedDescription: At about 2245 i was out walking dog and looked up, thought i was watching a satellite or space station but it last much to long heading easterly and a large aircraft  was on the same heading flying several miles to the right. the ufo was a bright object much lower and brighter than your typical satellite and i watch move west to east for several minutes before clouds and horizon blocked my view.
content.summary: First thought it to be space station but it lasted to long and a large aircraft followed it but to the right several miles away ... same flight path

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i are from jackson county. one summer day in the year 2000 we went cruising out in the country. we started driving around 11 p.M approximate. we eventually got lost and didn't know where we were. my friend was driving and he eventually said something like i think i know where we are. we are by tunnelton which is in lawrence county. he said there were some tunnels close by that you drive through and that is was kinda spooky. so i said ok lets do it. we started driving looking for these tunnels. i remember it was around 2 a.M. because i looked at the radio clock and said something like its getting late. are we going to stay out all night? my friend said we will start back home when we find a tunnel. i don't remember exactly how i saw the two objects that i saw, but i do remember the sky being clear and rounding a corner. i am not sure how far away the two objects were, but they appeared to be as big as a softball or basketball from my angle. one of the objects was blue. i am not sure if the whole thing was blue, but it was glowing blue. the other object was red and it was growing red. they were disc shaped and appeared to hovering. they eventually started moving and it seemed like they were circling each other. both objects started flashing lights. i do not think they were in a pattern, but i honestly do not know. i was in shock. i knew these objects were not normal. the red object eventually spun like a top and disappeared. the blue object soon followed. it looked like they spun and flew off, but they flew off so fast that i couldn't tell if they really did or just disappeared. i looked at my friend after all of this because we were in complete silence while we watched. he said he tried talking to me during the ordeal, but it was like he couldn't talk. i don't remember feeling this way, but he said he did. i do remember feeling like a numb feeling and feeling like my thought process had slowed down. i have only told my wife and my parents about this night. of course, no one believes me, but i know that i saw something special this night. this night has stayed with me all of these years.
content.summary: Two objects in the sky, one red, one blue, disc shaped, hovering

content.detailedDescription: I was driving south on 71 hwy and looked to the east at which time i saw an orange / pinkish beam come down from the sky. it was skinny at the top and widened as it got to the ground. i watched it for about two seconds and it was gone. no craft was seen.
content.summary: I was driving and saw a beam come down from the sky.

content.detailedDescription: Enjoying the weather on deck , looked up and there it was , new it wasn't an airplane , looked like a huge cigar glowing cylinder fling real low fast and smooth turn on a dime straight west and was gone in 4 seconds , shocked still shocked was out to my cousins today we were still wandering what we saw sped up and was gone
content.summary: Setting on deck look at the very blue sky there it was going south , ask cousin what it was said wow watch for seconds turned west and excellerated gone

content.detailedDescription:
Standing on the deck of my boat well after evening, i was stargazing.  i saw what i took for a bright star, until i noticed that it was moving far slower than a meteor,  but far faster than an airplane.  it continued in this speed and direction until it disappeared over the horizon.

aircraft must fly within the atmosphere which constraints their appearant altitude above the horizon.  an aircraft at 45degrees can be no more then 10 miles from the observer.  that distance is too close for it to appear as a point of light.  in addition aircraft have blinking lights excepting only when they are traveling directly toward the observer.  spacecraft, including satellites must move ballistically except for the few seconds after liftoff. no spacecraft can reflect sunlight when it is the shadow of earth as was the location of this light.

it occurs to me that far more sightings such as this may occur than are reported because most observers are simply not sophisticated enough recognize or discern  inexplicable behavior.
content.summary: Very bright light moving non- ballistic and constantly with any known air or space craft

content.detailedDescription:
It's back. between 8:30-9pm 8/3 saw same route as other sandwich sighting month ago . about 15 mins later a smaller white light very high in atmosphere traveled approx se nw close to being e to w. about 15 mins later saw another white light even higher that other traveling in opposite direction as bright orange light.
i thought was plane or helicopter at 1st. i know local & boston aerial objects. these were not. .
i live in sandwich village & have bed under skylight. i often wake up at 3-4 am & like clockwork i see a white light streaking across skys very high. satellites??
have never posted any sightings before & doing so to see if others see  same & white lights  streaking across sky's in early am. is there a satellite path  over the cape going from approx west to east at 3-4 am due to air base? 
like other sighting i know helicopters as they fly right over my house. the orange ball was not one,  or local air field. never seen anything like it in my 15 years  area. by time i raced to get ipad to record, 30 secs ,  it had disappeared in east. ironically 2  white lights 15 min apart similar to early am ones had never seen  before & i stargaze a lot with ipad app.
content.summary: Posting to see if others on cape cod saw bright orange lights

content.detailedDescription: I walked out front to smoke a cigarette and had my wife walk out with me.  she was talking to her mother on the phone when i noticed something flash in the sky.  i looked up and saw what i thought was an extremely bright star.  it then proceeded to move across the sky in a straight line toward the north(from the south).  as it got closer to the city, it veered to the north east.  i live close to an airport and a military base is about 40 miles away.  i know for a fact this is no helicopter, plane, or government craft, at least that is made public.  i was able to record this sighting and will gladly send a copy of this to you.  it is dark and the object is clearly visible.  i used the home in front of mine for reference.
content.summary: This was the largest i have ever seen and was able to capture on video.

content.detailedDescription:
Notes on elevation to distance from questionnaire are answered here. from bedroom window - distance: line of sight approx. 180', approx. 70 ' above ground, filled approx. 1/2 viewing area of window, 30" w x 40 " h. shape: smooth curves & symmetrical, saucer form w/dome. appeared to have no openings, external features, windows, (except when e's observed),etc. color: silvery dark gray on entire object. stationary/no sound/no smoke/no trail. entities seen clearly in dome section. familiar: craft i've been aboard since childhood. familiar: waking hours.

written report available & drawings. original report went to researcher to share. since then, memory of other parts of encounter have returned & i continue to add those into report.  condensed:
* winter of '92. time: 5:30 pm. duration: 2 1/2 hours. 2nd floor of home. n bedrm. w window. awake. alone in home. finished chores/practice downstairs. taking up laundry. held in a triangular force field. room electric feel. compelled to window. held at feet. looked sw. 1st thought of as star. a tel/comm asked (male): "would you like us to come closer?"  said, "no" but it came anyway. bright light. familiar, round, silver, gray saucer in front of me through the window. open section in dome. could see: 5 entities. 1 tall in center and 4 small - 2 on either side of tall.(description in report)was not scared because this was a familiar craft and i figured that this encounter would be o.K. but i did not like being held in place in my room.
* inside of craft: noticed small e's had robes. appeared mechanical.(description/ht. bld. " in report)
uncertain how to describe this even now: center of craft had some kind of hardened gel substance. believe military male was in center and that was the 'voice' of tel/comm at first communication. tall e was a 'see through' and believe it was designed to pilot the craft. 4 digits. 3 of which were on a round, black ball with a type of gel on a 'flight panel.'
* back in room: conversation of a 'faith' nature.(in report)
chronological order of next events are unsure to me. 
1. aboard the craft. handled by mechanicals. taken to the gel center wall.(measures & # in report)
2. conversation with military but no recall. conversation with pilot 'see through' entity. after approx. 10 min. it began to sweat and i could no longer be near. noticed importance of that protocol/distance...As well as remarking on it's physical make up which opened up the door for conversation.
3. listened to a conversation between tall e and military but no recall.
4. encounter with 'see through' e & some kind of circular energy beam which was stopped due to a voice spoken to the entity.
5. walking perimeter of craft after being taken to the 'engine room. seeing a smaller, square version of the larger energy room/propulsion. reminded me of how we run our electrical units throughout a house. outside perimeter was a beautiful hallway. soft light emanated from sections. cool. rounded center section. different from other crafts. walking above the floor was similar. electric/mag force of some kind, but again familiar since childhood...That is how you walk...As if on a 4-6" carpet. pushed back from surgical room by tall golden. observed a conversation between military & e in a separate room. (believe now that the military male was not to have sent comm to me. was allowed on craft and knew the species, tall e's. however, i believe they were there to pick up a young child who now works in a major area of work as do the other children. and, the us military male was in training)  
6. viewing of the underbelly. 3 rings. blue. 2 rings close & clockwise outer rim. inner counter. pulse: tempo of qtr. at 52. largo. pitch:g below mid. c. freq. of 196.00. lights mix/pulse together & random. calm.
* asked if i was interested in a ride or to see how it worked. "yes."
placed in 'engine room' or propulsion area. in front of large, glass wall. energy components. intelligence. comm came in to area the the craft had to leave due to tracking. energy components reacted with intelligence within the gel. (drawing & distinction between energy components in report)
* a gel used later in '97 encounter for prep. which i was placed in for travel. believe now: gel aboard this craft used in conjunction with the 'control panel' as seen with the 'see trough' entity as it placed digits on the black ball on the panel on other level. in direct conjunction with telepathic ability between pilot & energy components.
* craft took off in silence after placing me back in room.  remained held in place in triangular force field at the window area as if weights were on the feet until the craft was gone. 
* checked the time. it was now 8:00. 2 1/2 hours had passed. 
* went outside. no craft. silence. no sound whatever. not even crickets or cars. returned to house. 
*several years later, i began to write and research looking for similar encounters of waking hour contact since childhood from other people.  contact still remains to this day. finally taking the time to send in a report, even though i have been writing them and sharing and speaking when asked. i am a member of mufon and working towards becoming a field investigator. it was important to sit down and review the cms report, finally fill one out, and become acquainted with this form.
* your question of #5 - describe your feelings, etc. they vary. emotions, reactions vary even though i've had contact and been aboard these crafts since childhood. i don't understand it all and certainly don't know all the answers. what changed my life and moved me forward after '92 was the call and encouragement that came from the researcher i contacted and sent this origianl report into. education/protocols of contact/propulsion observations/amazement/wonder/joy/excitement of travel...Those are my feelings, reactions, and actions and will remain so with every encounter.
content.summary: 5:00-8:30. held in triangle force. aboard. entities: see trough (pilot ),mechanicals or robotics,tall goldens, us military. believe they were there for a pick up & train for military. conversations. shown 'engine room.'tracked.Tone & lights of underbelly.

content.detailedDescription: I was rollerblading in a tennis/basketball court in granville island vancouver bc around 10:00 pm, the lights went out and it was time for me to take off my roller blades. so i sat down on a bench and proceeded to take them off in the dark.  a low flying plane caught my attention and i looked up also noticing an interesting looking star just above it, so i watched the star for between 5 and 10 minutes.   as i was looking at the star a bright orange light attracted my eyes off to the side and that's when i saw 3 illuminating objects intermingling together and around each other.  within a couple of seconds two ufo's disappeared leaving one on its own hovering what seemed to be as high as the low flying plane above me.  it sat for a few seconds and then glided in a descending arch downward and over the building behind me with no sound.  as the object was descending i perceived it to be larger than a plane (longer, wider, and thicker). it looked higher up than the plane to start with but descended to what i perceived to be closer than the plane and possibly just above the short building behind me. my perception of height and size may or may not be accurate due to my basic understanding of size and distance, but it looked close to me and large.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: 3 glowing peachy orange oval shaped ufo's decended quickley from the sky above my head and flew togehter in a intermingling formation, two disappeared and one hovered above my head and decended slowley down in an arch and above the building behind me.

content.detailedDescription: There were four of us standing on my back porch when a large, increasingly bright orange/white sphere appeared in the western sky. fly right at us about 3 seconds then veered off north and then just vanished. then again alter that night we saw another similar light in the exact same spot that flew right over us, that had a smaller green light around it that flew right over us then disappeared with a plane in the sky headed to the airport.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: It was like a giant orange glowing sphere in the sky that fly right at us for 10s the disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
It was august 1st 2013, 9:47p.M., and i was sitting out on my balcony at night with my friend when we noticed a bright orange light over the ocean. at first it didn't seem out of the ordinary because there are always lights from buoys, boats, planes, beach patrol, etc. this light was much larger than anything we have seen over the ocean before and it wasn't blinking like other lights i normally see out there. it could not have been an airplane or helicopter because it moved to slow  and we could not hear an engine or anything. it was silent . there was a lighting storm coming from the northwest at the time. this looked nothing like what a storm produces.

it started out large and nearly along the horizon (i'm not sure whether or not it actually when into the water at all or if it came out of the water)it went diagonally up into the sky at a steady pace for about a minute and got smaller as it made it's way up there, and hung there for another minute or two before it moved farther away and faded behind clouds. the entire time it changed from dark red, to orange and yellow. almost like fire. my friend and i were stunned, we both knew it was something completely out of the ordinary. we ran inside to tell our moms right as it faded the first time. they came out soon after and saw it right before it went out of the balcony's view, when it was small enough to look like a star that was slowly moving. this is when i made a short and unsteady video.

we wonder if anyone else had seen this strange event. with hundreds of condos on the beach someone else must have seen this.
content.summary: Orange\red glowing light started at horizon over ocean. it moved up and then diagonally up over the ocean from south to north.

content.detailedDescription: On saturday, 08/03/2013, i was sitting outside on our deck with my wife.  we both, about the same time saw a glowing object to the southwest of our location.  the object was at a very high altitude and moving to the northeast very fast.  at first we thought maybe military but the size was too big.  maybe an astroid.  the object continued on an approximate heading of 075 degrees until we lost sight as the object was lost in the terminator.  the object was high enough that the only light we were able to see was the reflection of the sun off of the object.  i asked my wife if she saw any strobes, she did not.  i saw no strobes either.
content.summary: Unknown object at very high altitude over kingsland texas on 08/03/2013

content.detailedDescription: On saturday, 08/03/2013, i was sitting outside on our deck with my wife.  we both, about the same time saw a glowing object to the southwest of our location.  the object was at a very high altitude and moving to the northeast very fast.  at first we thought maybe military but the size was too big.  maybe an astroid.  the object continued on an approximate heading of 075 degrees until we lost sight as the object was lost in the terminator.  the object was high enough that the only light we were able to see was the reflection of the sun off of the object.  i asked my wife if she saw any strobes, she did not.  i saw no strobes either.
content.summary: Unknown object at very high altitude over kingsland texas on 08/03/2013

content.detailedDescription:
1- i was recording two airplane with an iphone 5 while my husband worked on his car. reason 
2-3- i didn't notice it while recording,later on when i checked the video i saw it. i had a friend of mine that is employed by the military, to take a look at it an examine it. he told me that the video was incredible ( i didn't think so) . he stopped it frame by frame, used all the tools at his disposal to find out what it could be. his. conclusions were: not military, not a big or dust on the camera etc. , he said it was an oval dark flying ship. i wish i could disclose his name, but he can't cause of his job.
4- it was going almost straight across the sky, but to even being able to see it on the video i had to considerably slow it down, and even than is incredibly fast!
5- since i didn't see it at the time of the recording, i'm gonna say n/a
6- since it was a "lucky catch", i would have never seen it at all if it wasn't for those 2 airplanes i was recording.

i included different speeds of the the same video. the last video is the original. toward the end there is another dark object but its just a big black bird.
thank you.
content.summary: It looked like a bullet, impossibly fast. you can see the comparison with the other 2 airplanes.

content.detailedDescription: See short desription
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Some thing woke me up very early this morning at about dawn went outside looked up and saw a donut shaped object very bright with a hole in the middle when i raised my arms and waved  it stopped curved slightly then stopped again then continued on its pat

content.detailedDescription:
In the late '70's (the exact date i do not recall), i was walking along a roadway at my grandmother's home with my two brothers and several cousins.  it was just past dark and a time when kids could walk about without fear in contrast to modern hysteria.  

while we were walking, a brilliant white beam was cast upon all of us from above.  the beam was so white and so bright that everyone seemed as if they were glowing.  the light was so radiant that nothing could be seen beyond the beam.  

the craft was apparently directly above us.  i remember trying to look up, but the light was so bright that i could not see anything but the light.  we were all terrified of the craft and no one knew what was going on.  no one heard any type of noise that would indicate a helicopter engine and it was much too low to be a blimp.  i would estimate the height of the craft to be perhaps twice as high as the tree tops.  i remember us running to our grandmother's home and trying to hide on her covered porch.  after a short duration, the craft extinguished the beam and headed off in a northeasterly direction.  i remember the craft seemed to move at an incredible speed after the beam was disengaged.  

even though this craft was incredibly close, i did not get a clear look at it due to the bright beam cast upon us.  i did seem to get an indication that the craft was very large when it jetted off in less than a second. but i did not get a clear look at the craft.  

i have no idea why this craft shinned a light upon us.  were they looking for something or were they just curious?  we were all just children at the time, but i have a vivid memory of what it was like to be in that beam.  it was scary.  we haven't talked about that event much since then, but maybe it's time for others to know what happened to us.  for me, it's not a question whether or not to believe if aliens exist.  i know they do.
content.summary: Ufo cast brilliant white beam upon me and several other family members for a duration of maybe 5 minutes.  then zipped off out of sight.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting outside with a friend and we both seen a bright orange circle to the right of us in the sky. we didn't know what it was, it was flying slowly through the sky. at first we seen one, but quickly after another was following its path, leading to a totally of six orange bright lights following each other in the same direction, about 10 seconds apart. we were really confused as to what this was and afraid at the same time. we lost sight over the circles when we could no longer see them because of the houses.
content.summary: I was sitting outside with a friend and we both seen a bright orange circle in the sky. total of 6 flew by about 10 seconds apart, no sound.

content.detailedDescription: I was at my sisters wedding reception at the natural history museum. i went out to have a cigarette and noticed several balls of light creeping in an eerily slow manner into the sky. several other observers joined me to get a decent look. the balls started in sets of four or five, flying into the sky. they appeared to saved as if they contained fire. slowly the lights would dim and then disapear. one or two i noted started to fall and then completely dissapeared. as each dissapeared, a new set would appear over the horizon. the most i could see at one time was something near ten. i at first thought that they seemed like weather ballrooms powered byy fire, but dismissed that due to the sheer number and a lack of reasoning as to their purpose.
content.summary: Bright but wavering lights slowly ascending into sky then burning out and falling, then dissapearing. twenty two total

content.detailedDescription:
1- i was walking toward my sister in law house.
2- i herd my sister in law shouting out loud, asking me what it could be
3- at first impression when it was farther i thought it was some sort of red orb, but as it got closer and closer we both knew it was an object, bigger than what it looked like and extremely fast.
4- when it was farther away i didn't think much of it, but in just a few seconds it was right on top of us, zigzagging so fast that i had a hard time keeping the cellphone camera on the object. it seam as if it was looking for something or looking at us. it wouldn't stay still for long periods and it flew away so fast that i barely noticed it was gone.
5- i was at a loss of words, couldn't belive my eyes and somehow both of us got a strong feeling that it wasn't the first time we seen it and vice versa.
6- i was trying as hard as i could to keep it on focus, and before i could even blink it was gone.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Other
content.summary: Very bizarre sighting. at first impression looked like an orb but the closer it got the more we realized it was some sort of ship. it seamed tad if it was scouting for something. and as it appeared it disappeared extremely fast .

content.detailedDescription:
I was a child (~10 years old) and lived in the small town of slaterville springs, ny, near ithaca, ny.  there was a large field on the edge of town.  people began gathering on the edge of the filed and watched a ufo.  the authorities were notified, apparently by those in the surrounding communities as well.  we were told it was a weather balloon.  may have been covered by the ithaca journal newspaper.

i had a second experience in the fall of 1976.  it was approx. 10:00 pm and i was driving in a vw beetle with my baby toward ithaca from candor, ny.  i was just coming into danby, ny and noticed a truck broken down on the opposite side of the road.  a moment later i saw a white, glowing orb that seemed to be skimming the tops of the trees on the hill before me.  from a distance it looked like car headlights, but it was just above the trees, and there are no roads up there.  the next thing i knew it was next to my car, traveling right next to me on the passenger side, going the same speed as the car, and had not changed in size even though it was very close.  it was maybe 10-15 feet from the car.  then it just disappeared.

both of these thing happened in close proximilty to ithaca, ny where cornell university is located.  although permission has been denied to build nuclear power plants there, there is a nuclear reactor at cornell most people don't know about.  i don't know if this may be the attraction for ufos.

if you have any questions at all, please contact me.  i've wanted to tell someone about these events for a long time.
content.summary: Summer day over field observed by several people

content.detailedDescription:
This was described to me by someone i do not know well, but we go to the same health club. interestingly this may be traceable in that it occurred in what should be a traceable address. please note, the witness described this with limited english, but he did seem genuinely unnerved and was hoping that i would tell him that what had happened was common in america.

witness (name eduardo) and i both belong to the 24 hour fitness health club and mainly use the hot tub in order to treat long standing injuries to leg and back. recently, the hot tub at the santa barbara location was closed due to renovations. eduardo initially began telling me, as we both soaked, that he needed the tub badly enough that he had gone to several other locations for 24hr fitness in order to use their hot tubs. however, while in san francisco, which is where his parents live, he had a very strange experience. 

apparently he looked up and went to what he thought was the location of a 24hr fitness in san francisco. when he got there, without noticing anything out of the ordinary he simply opened the door of the location and walked inside. however, after entering he was struck by the fact that building seemed completely empty and only a few lights were on. believing he'd made a mistake he turned around and attempted to open the door he had just come through only to find it locked. a bit disconcerted he walked towards a light that was on across the room and called out several times. suddenly out of nowhere there were two beings standing near him. he described them as tall, extremely thin, bone white and with inhumanly large eyes. he even held up circled thumb and forefinger to indicate how much larger than normal eyes they were. he described them as looking like dead people. they both wore institutional green coveralls with a breast patch that read "engineering". he remarked that the coveralls seemed extremely old. they were not terribly polite and told him he was not supposed to be in the building. they led him to another door in the building, not the one he had entered through, and unceremoniously saw him through it. he emerged into an alley that seemed to have an unusually high number of homeless people in it. he described himself as quite frightened by the whole experience, and to this observer seemed sincerely upset by the experience.

this strikes me as worthy of a follow up as the address for 24 hour fitness in san francisco should be readily found and a visit to the facility seems warranted. this person has no desire for publicity and neither do i.
content.summary: Man went into a building and encountered two beings that did not seem human.

content.detailedDescription: My son and i were watching the nhl 2012 winter classic on television.During the break between the second and third periods,the band "the roots" were performing.During their performance we noticed an unusual light streak behind the left field seating area, into an opening between those seats and the large video screen,and accelerate away.This light changed directions multiple times.I've never witnessed any man made aircraft do what this light did and am perplexed as to what it may have been.I attached a you tube link where the video can be watched.The light appears @ the 1:23 mark.
content.summary: While watching nhl 2012 winter classic on television, my son and i noticed a streaking light fly into,then out of picture frame.
